content:
Is there a way in a CodeSystem to indicate for each code the inspiration? For example, in Provenance we have a few codeSystem that are highly inspired by W3C definition of Provenance concepts. Sometimes we can show a strong linkage, but the linkage is not to what W3C manages as a vocabulary, but rather that they define more abstractly.
I can imagine explaining this inspiration broadly in the CodeSystem.description. I am just looking for something that could be more specific on a concept by concept basis.
It might be appropriate to include tis information in concept.definition
